title: Art of hand screen printing
creator_credit: Albert Lane, Stanley Murphy and Orion Pictures Corporation
brief_description: The evolution of hand printed silk from the designer’s original sketch, taken from nature, through the many processes until the fabric is completed. Shows in detail the transfer of the photographic copy to the screen, mixing of dyes and the steam treating of the fabric.
creator_credit_for_label: Albert Lane, Stanley Murphy and Orion Pictures Corporation
